book.synopsis: Waugh tells the story of the Marchmain family. Aristocratic, beautiful and charming, the Marchmains are indeed a symbol of England and her decline in this novel of the upper class of the 1920s and the abdication of responsibility in the 1930s.
book.dimensions: Height: 7.75 Inches, Length: 5 Inches, Weight: 0.7 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
